function.name: get_distance_between_cities
function.long_description: Calculates the geographical distance between two cities by converting city names into coordinates using an external mapping API and applying a standard distance formula.
example_user_queries: Distance between New York and London
How far is Paris from Berlin?
Calculate distance between Mumbai and Delhi
How many kilometers between Tokyo and Osaka?
Distance from San Francisco to Los Angeles
How far is Rome from Milan?
